title: Angular AI Config File Options Schema
description: Generates AI configuration files for Angular projects. This schematic creates configuration files that help AI tools follow Angular best practices, improving the quality of AI-generated code and suggestions.

tool.x-prompt: Which AI tools do you want to configure with Angular best practices? https://angular.dev/ai/develop-with-ai
tool.description: Specifies which AI tools to generate configuration files for. These file are used to improve the outputs of AI tools by following the best practices.
